title: The Flying turtle
brief_description: Herman the Turtle, determined to learn how to fly, takes lessons from a greedy eagle. Herman finally gets a pair of wings after plummeting to his death and going to heaven. Animated by Gil Turner, Cecil Surry and Robert Bentley. Music by Clarence Wheeler.
